___name.description: A name to identify the rule.

___active.description: Enable/Disable a rule. When disabled, the rule is not evaluated on events received.

___transformations.description: List of transformations to apply to an event once the conditions matched.

___fn.description: Javascript expression to transform the events. If not present, event is not transformed and passed as it is received.

___expression.description: Javascript expression to let more complex transformation. **MUST** be a valid javascript expression

___sample.description: A valid sample to validate the transformation expression.

___eventSourceTemplateId.description: The event source template to inject to the transformation validation.

___eventTypeId.description: The event type to inject to the transformation validation.

___event.description: A valid event for the transformation expression validation.

___description.description: Human friendly text to let the possibility to explain what the transformation does.

___actionTargetId.description: The action target to send the event transformed.

___conditions.description: List of condition to evaluate against events received.

items.description: Condition to evaluate, **MUST** define at least one of the three condition criteria: `eventSourceId`, `eventTypeId` or `fn`.

___fn.description: Javascript expression to be evaluated. If not present, only `event source` and `event type` will be evaluated.

___expression.description: Javascript expression to let more complex condition matching. **MUST** be a valid javascript expression

___sampleEvent.description: A valid event that will be evaluated to true with the expression.

___description.description: Human friendly text to let the possibility to explain what the condition evaluates.

___eventTypeId.description: The event type to match on event received. If not present, joker `*` will be used.

___eventSourceId.description: The event source to match on event received. If not present, joker `*` will be used.
